uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component

Class AudioMediaListPlayerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.MediaPlayerEventAdapter
      • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component.AudioMediaPlayerComponent
        • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component.AudioMediaListPlayerComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaListPlayerEventListener, MediaPlayerEventListener

    public class AudioMediaListPlayerComponent
extends AudioMediaPlayerComponent
implements MediaListPlayerEventListener
    Encapsulation of an audio media list player.

    This component extends the AudioMediaPlayerComponent to incorporate a MediaListPlayer and an associated MediaList.

    • Method Detail

      • getMediaListPlayer

        public final MediaListPlayer getMediaListPlayer()
        Get the embedded media list player reference.

        An application uses this handle to control the media player, add listeners and so on.

        Returns:
        media list player

      • getMediaList

        public final MediaList getMediaList()
        Get the embedded media list reference.
        Returns:
        media list

      • played

        public void played(MediaListPlayer mediaListPlayer)
        Description copied from interface: MediaListPlayerEventListener
        Place-holder, do not use. Warning: the native media list player event manager reports that it does not support this event.
        Specified by:
        played in interface MediaListPlayerEventListener
        Parameters:
        mediaListPlayer - media list player that raised the event
